metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2089 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in ownCloud before 5.0.6 allows remoteauthenticated users to execute arbitrary PHP code by uploading a craftedfile, then accessing it via a direct request to the file in /data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2089` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
